content: To refine my taste and understanding by drawing from the wisdom of masters across diverse fields, cultivating a unique and complex perspective. I seek to immerse myself in the richness of different cultures, religions, belief systems, and political landscapes, to truly understand the motivations behind human actions. Through this journey, I aim to write polarizing articles that spark meaningful feedback and discussion. Above all, I am committed to the revival of *ad fontes* education, learning from the old masters to rediscover timeless wisdom and foster a deeper, more nuanced understanding of the world.
